attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is completely unfair for the government to continue to take a tax in the form of inheritance tax from the people of this country when income tax has almost certainly been paid on this money. How can it be fair to make a second tax on it?  This petition is proposing to scrap this incredibly unjustified tax, and allow people to fully benefit from the money they are entitled to.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=inheritance+tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
